title: The MCU Should Replace Jonathan Majors' Kang With Gugu Mbatha-Raw's Ravonna Renslayer
description:
Jonathan Majors, who had been positioned to play the next main villain of the biggest movie franchise of all time, was convicted of assault and harassment on Monday, and about an hour after that verdict came down, Marvel Studios fired him. Thus ends a year of uncertainty during which the Marvel Cinematic Universe has cratered both creatively and in terms of audience interest (link to something), and which resulted in the whole MCU slate being delayed a year while the powers-that-be try to get it together.

Without Majors, the big immediate question is easy: Wh

title: Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League Preorders - Editions, Bonuses, Release Date, And More
New On Disney Plus In January 2024: Percy Jackson, Marvel's Echo
description:
With January and the New Year right around the corner, Disney+ has released its schedule of all the new content coming to the streaming service next month. Starting January 1, viewers can look forward to a lineup of titles set to debut throughout the first month of the year.

Percy Jackson fans will be able to continue following along with additional episodes of the series (premiering weekly on Wednesdays). The adaptation of the popular fantasy novels "tells the fantastical story of a 12-year-old modern demigod, Percy Jackson, who's just coming to terms with his newfound supernatural powers when the sky god Zeus accuses him of stealing his master lightning bolt. Now Percy must trek across America to find it and restore order to Olympus."

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: GTA 6: Could Actor From GTA 5 Also Be In The New Game? Ned Luke Weighs In
description:
Actor Ned Luke, who played Michael in GTA V, recently appeared on Larry Lawton's YouTube show, and the interview began with a bang. Lawton introduced Luke as "Michael from Grand Theft Auto V and Grand Theft Auto VI." This would be a pretty big reveal, as so far, there have been zero actors or characters confirmed for GTA VI so far beyond Lucia.

The camera then cuts back to Luke, who is sporting an extremely shocked face. Luke attempts to clarify the situation, saying, "I'm not in... we don't... GTA 6 is unknown things right now. Just to make that clear."

Luke went on to say that Lawton, a former real-life jewel thief who spent time in prison and is now a motivational speaker, "had a senior moment."

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: WoW: Dragonflight Will Receive Warbands, New Heritage Armor Quests Ahead Of The War Within
description:
World of Warcraft: Dragonflight will receive three more content updates ahead of the arrival of the MMORPG's next expansion, The War Within, in the summer of 2024.

That's according to Blizzard's 2024 content roadmap for WoW, which outlines what players can expect to be coming both to the current version of the MMO and the various versions of WoW Classic Blizzard is now running simultaneously.

The Worldsoul Saga begins in 2024!
Our cadence continues in the year ahead with six content updates plus the new expansion, The War Within.

title: Destiny 2 Wish-Keeper Exotic Bow - How To Start The Starcrossed Exotic Mission
description:
The latest week of Destiny 2's Season of the Wish brings a new Exotic weapon into the game for players to chase: Wish-Keeper, a new Exotic bow. This one is similar to past seasonal Exotics, like Vexcalibur and Retrofit Zero, in that you'll earn the opportunities to craft different versions over time as you replay its Exotic mission, Starcrossed.

You won't find the mission as soon as you boot up Destiny 2 this week, however. In order to unlock the Starcrossed mission, you'll need to advance the seasonal story, the Wishing All The Best quest line, so if you've been neglecting your duties in The Coil and Riven's Lair, you'll need to catch up on past weeks first.

Next, complete this week's seasonal mission, Apophasis. That'll take you through the story of the Vex o

title: CoD: MW3 And Warzone Holiday Event Includes Deadly Snowball Fights, Killer Zombie Santa
description:
Call of Duty's annual holiday event, CODMAS, begins today and offers up a variety of activities to partake in themed around the holidays, including snowball fights and a mission to kill a zombified Santa. Here's everything you need to know about CODMAS 2023, which includes activities and events covering multiplayer, Zombies, and Warzone.

When is it?

CODMAS begins December 19 at 10 AM PT / 1 PM ET and runs through January 3 at 8 AM PT / 11 AM ET. That should give players a good amount of time to check out the content during any breaks they might have from work or school.

Santa's Slayground event

As part of the Santa's Slayground event, players can complete up to eight challenges to unlock special gear like the "Christmas Skulls" calling card, the "Elfsecution" finishing move, and a special weapon blueprint and operator skin. Players can complete challenges across multiplayer, Zombies, and Warzone to unlock the special ge

title: Best Gaming Headset Deals Of The Week
description:
The days leading up to Christmas are always a pretty great time to shop thanks to last-minute sales. This year is no different, and right now you'll find nearly 30 great gaming headsets available for some of the best prices of 2023. Products from Turtle Beach, Logitech, SteelSeries, and more are included in the savings, as are headsets for PS5, Switch, Xbox, PC, and mobile.

If you're looking for a headset with universal compatibility, the SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7X is one of the best around. This wireless headset offers superb comfort and stellar audio for the price. It's extremely versatile with 2.4GHz wireless and Bluetooth support. The 7X is technically the Xbox version of the headset, but it works wirelessly with PS5, Nintendo Switch, PC, and mobile devices. title: New On Hulu In January 2024: Marvel's Echo, Legendary's Monsterverse, And More
description:
With January and the New Year right around the corner, Hulu has released its schedule of all the new content coming to the streaming service next month. Starting January 1, viewers can look forward to a lineup of titles set to debut throughout the first month of the year.

With the holidays behind us, you can start the new year with some Marvel superheroics. Hulu will be one of two services debuting the newest TV series from Marvel Studios, Echo. Created by Brian Michael Bendis and David Mack, Echo has been featured across Marvel Comics, usually tied to street-level heroes like Luke Cage and Daredevil. She was introduced in the MCU with Disney+'s Hawkeye show and played by Alaqua Cox. All five episodes of Echo are arriving simultaneously on both Hulu and Disney+ on January 9, with the show leaving Hulu in April and becoming exclusive on Disney+.

description:

title: PSA: Marvel's Wolverine Spoilers Are Spreading After Insomniac Hack
description:
Be careful when spotting anything online about Marvel's Wolverine for the foreseeable future. Gameplay for the PS5 exclusive--as well as storyline details--have leaked out after developer Insomniac reportedly was hacked by a group called Rhysida. It has been accused of trying to ransom $2 million out of Sony before releasing private information when those demands weren't met.

In a series of messages on X (formerly known as Twitter), prolific modder Lance McDonald chronicled how the Wolverine footage and details could pop up, with gameplay video now appearing on sites like Reddit. A PC build of Wolverine was reportedly included in the leaked data, which could make it easier for spoilers and gameplay to be shared online.

In addition to the Wolverine leaks, the Insomniac

title: Zack Snyder "Of Course" Would Be Interested In Making A Fortnite Movie
description:
Director Zack Snyder has discussed the possibility of making a Fortnite movie one day, saying he would "of course" be interested in that. Snyder has previously spoken about being a big fan of the game, saying he plays "too much" Fortnite and often stays up until 3 AM.

He told Etalk that he "really wanted" to have characters from his newest movie, Rebel Moon, appear in Fortnite through skins, but that didn't work out. He would be interested in directing a live-action Fortnite movie, if the opportunity ever arose. "Fortnite is an amazing world, and it is an amazing distraction for me. But it's really cool, and the alchemy that they've created there is really unique. When I started playing it, I thought I knew what it was, and then it was something entirely different," he s

title: The Worst Games Of 2023 According To Metacritic
description:
As the laws of science dictate, for every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction, and with 2023 being full of great games, plenty of mediocre and middling games were also released this year.

It's worth noting that, of course, no one wants to make a bad game. There are plenty of games with ambitious goals that are never achieved--titles that genuinely attempt to deliver a fresh adventure but lack the technical expertise or budget to bring those dreams to life.

And as lacklustre as those games might be, they'll have their fans. There will be true believers who can overlook technical flaws and shoddy quality to find a hidden gem, but they're going to have to do some deep digging. Over on GameSpot's sister site Metacritic, we've plumbed the depths of critical consensus to find the worst of the worst in 2023. These are the w

title: Insomniac Suffers Devastating Leak After Ransom Demands
description:
Hackers who stole information from Marvel's Spider-Man 2 developer Insomniac Games have released much of that data into the wild, reportedly after Sony refused to pay a ransom for the return of those files. The group--Rhysida --demanded a payment of 50 BitCoin (around $2 million) within seven days, and after the deadline passed, the hackers followed up on their threat by releasing 1.67 terabytes of information related to upcoming Insomniac projects.

According to Cyber Daily, 98% of the stolen data has been released and contains information on Insomniac's upcoming Wolverine game and the next decade of projects that the studio is working on. Sensitive information such as internal HR documents, employment forms, and screenshots of Insomniac's Slack channels were also included in the stolen files released online. Rhysida claims to have acquired employee

title: Nickelodeon Asked Seth Rogen To Not Milk The Milking Jokes in TMNT: Mutant Mayhem
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem takes some big swings with the franchise, specifically a stylized animation aesthetic and an infusion of silly, adolescent humor--including an ongoing milking bit. So writer Seth Rogen admits he was a bit on edge showcasing the movie for the first time to Nickelodeon bigwigs.

Variety reports Rogen recalled what it was like presenting Mutant Mayhem to Nickelodeon president of animation Ramsey Ann Naito. "We were so nervous and scared that we were going to show them a scene from the movie and they would be like, 'What? No," the screenwriter and producer said. "They loved it, and they were so supportive.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: See Your 2023 Steam Stats Like Most-Played Game, Top Genres, And More
description:
2023 is coming to a close. To mark the end of the year, Valve has rolled out a "year-in-review" tool that allows players to review their 2023 stats and find out which games they played the most, their top genres, number of achievements unlocked, and lots more.

The Steam Year-in-Review page also allows players to see how their results compare against the wider community and share their results around the internet. Valve created a pretty funny video, too, to promote the Steam Year in Review--check it out below.

The Steam Year-in-Review page follows similar wrap-ups from Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo. You can use the links below to find your 2023 stats on those platforms.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: 10 Biggest Box Office Bombs Of 2023
description:
Disappointing.


2023 had its fair share of box office success stories, and it also had a number of high-profile films that were expected to do well but came up short. This focuses on the latter.

We've compiled a list of movies released in 2023 that at least some people believed would perform reasonably well at the box office and then did not, for whatever reason. This list includes films like The Flash and The Marvels, two superhero films from rival companies DC and Marvel that did poorly at the box office. The Marvels, for instance, is the MCU's worst-performing movie of all time. The Flash, for its part, was riddled with controversy surrounding actor Ezra Miller and their significant legal issues.
